main event: A UFO sighting reported in Yellow Springs, Ohio on August 7, 1968, by multiple witnesses including Mrs. Martha Sheppard and Mr. Carl Thomas, who observed a bright orange-colored light hovering overhead.
interesting points: The object hovered for about 5 minutes,The witnesses described the object as the size of a quarter held at arm's length,Chief Norman E. Davis confirmed multiple calls to the police regarding the sighting,The object moved rapidly to the northwest after hovering,The sighting was reported to the Project Blue Book for further evaluation.
witness description: Mrs. Martha Sheppard and Mr. Carl Thomas
